title: God Of War In Another World
description:
Description :
        Zhao Yun, the famous general from the Three Kingdoms, is reborn into a magical civilization in another world. He fights his way out of the land of dark despair, slaying fierce beasts and vanquishing outer gods. With his martial prowess, he sweeps away the mighty powers and rebuilds the Great Han Kingdom, gathering the faith of all races. Ultimately, he ascends to the throne of the overlord. In this realm beyond the stars, where gods gather, watch as Zhao Yun stirs up a storm and becomes the White Dragon Martial God, reigning supreme in the otherworld!
